We were tagged by @sadieandwillow to upload the most recent picture on moms phone. This me in the zone!  I would like to nominate @hoppy_floppy_basset @choop_bassethound @showmeyourbasset
Yes, I can be generous and giving, but when it comes to cheese, it'll be this side of never!!
After the weekend I need to catch up on some shuteye. Sweet dreams of bacon. Keep your friends close and your treats closer.
Happy Hump Day!  I believe in pacing yourself, take a deep breath. Dial it down a notch!
Today I need to rest up, spring is coming. I need to make plans, I'm sure there are buried treats in the garden. A couple of tennis balls have showed up, good things are happening!
In honor of National Puppy Day, this is Miss Lilly visiting mom at work. #nationalpuppyday

In order to help mom make beds I have to bring a biscuit and a squeaky toy. It's like a party, there's the biscuit dance and hide the toy. I'm not allowed on the bed, something about time constraints?? Oh well, it's fun.
Mom, dad, why don't I get bacon and pizza?  Everyone else does, even the guy across the street. Sunday's are when I like to take a moment to see what's working and areas we need to work on.

Mom, dad, we need to talk. My friends Fred and Jack have proven that our treat allotment should be increased, which includes bacon and pizza. Jack is 8, so he should know.  I'll await the verdict. @mrfredbasset
If you need to speak with me, it won't be until after lunch. I'm in consultation until then. Surprise me with bacon at lunch.

I got to sleep on the sheets, only because I saw an opportunity. I'm allowed to sleep on the bed, on my blanket, but this morning I got lucky. Now mom don't go all crazy , it'll be fine, trust me, love you â¤ï¸
Being the holiday weekend I'm expecting something special. Chances are good there will be bacon, when there are guests it's a must!  I'm going to use my special powers. Positive thinking!

It's Monday and it's raining, so I'm unavailable until Tuesday. 
I was nominated by @maxiandbella to do a #snugasabuginarug challenge, I would like to nominate @hansu_h and any other friends if you would like.
I like to have the weekends to relax and catch up. I'll start with a nap, then get up, circle around and have another nap. It's one of those days.
I like to keep an eye on the guy across the street. I think it was date night last night, he was dressed to impress!  Those socks were speaking volumes, definitely a date.
I'm loving spring!  I found a bone in the front garden, it was a good day. Of course I wasn't able to bring it inside (yet). Too many rules that just don't make sense!
I was very busy watching the duct cleaning people. The man said it would cost $150 plus me. Mom said I'll pay the cash but I'm staying. You know you're loved when!
In order to celebrate the Royal baby and spring weather, I choose  a subtle fasinator!  I find this warm weather so inspirational, will probably tend to the garden later âï¸

Had my yearly visit to the vet, everything went well. Doc said I was a little thick, but nothing to worry about. Thank goodness, I was expecting a tearful confession to the bacon. Doc reported that I was so gentle and sweet, I licked her ear in thanks.

Some days I like to plan and make lists, other days I let things happen. There have been new discoveries in the backyard, found a plastic fly swatter, two more tennis balls and a few sticks. It's gonna be a good day ð¾
There's a time change, so I figure I lost an hour of sleep. Now I have to figure out how to make this up. I'll start with a nap, I don't want to waste a lot of time figuring this out!
Today I'm channelling spring!  I'm in need of some inspiration, let's see if cheese or bacon helps. It's a creative process, try not to dampen the spirit.

Happy Earth Day!  Today I will show my appreciation by going for a walk, sniffing the beautiful earth, peeing on our precious grass, and chasing any varmint that crosses my path!  I will give thanks, now I just have to figure a way to tie in the cheese.
Excuse me, pardon me, did you say something? Are we going somewhere?  Did you say treat?  You're going to have to speak up! #tongueouttuesday
Yes, I'm listening, that glazed over look just means I've gone to a deeper understanding. Please continue!
We are in for some cold weather, so I'll be inside more. I'm told to use my inside voice. Why do they have to put a cap on enthusiasm?  I like to have the freedom to express myself.
Another good series to read is the Hunger Games. Great adventure. Didn't think I would like this but gave it a try and am glad I did.

Yes I'll admit it bothers me when you sneak a piece of cheese. I can always tell, and it's not those shifty eyes. I can smell it on your hands and breath, and turning your back to me doesn't change anything. And yes, I'd like a piece of cheese!
Happy Friday the 13th!  I'm not really superstitious, as long as I have complete order. If something is moved or out of place then I get a little concerned.

Caught me untucking my lip. It's very important to know where your people go, that's why I do a full body sniff interrogation. I just ask that you stand against the wall and spread'm!  #tongueouttuesday
Excuse the stuck lip, this was unexpected!  I was tagged by @mrfredbasset to post a closeup picture of Miss Lilly. Would you like to post a closeup picture @webby_reads @herbie_and_cooper @erinrivage
I like to ease into Monday's, it's all about pacing yourself. I'm hoping for bacon, sometimes you just have to believe.
I'm trying to sneak up on dad in the kitchen. I think it's important to include everyone in the house when preparing meals or snacks. Otherwise it's considered selfish and cruel. Just saying!
Ok here's a hint, I'm sitting in front of the door and sometimes I make a little too much noise. Now for your best clue, there's the leash. I'll leave the rest up to you!

I'm tired after helping mom with her exercising. I especially liked to floor routines, I smothered her face and ears with kisses. The band stretches another favourite, dodging in and out, classic moves.
I was about to say...pardon me, now I forgot what I was going to say. I can see it's gonna be one of those days. I'm going to have a nap and start all over again! #tongueouttuesday
Mom says I have a crazy hour.  I like to call it activity hour. It includes, watch the ball go under the furniture, this is where everyone participates. And of course the popular biscuit dance.
I have only two reasons for getting up, and you're looking at them. I don't like to complicate the day with elaborate plans, especially on a Monday.
Count me in for helping with the garden today. First rule is I get full access unsupervised, second, I'm not available until the afternoon. And there will be refreshments included, right?
Mom and I had dads truck detailed!  All eyes were on me when they said there's an extra charge for pet hair removal. Don't know what they're talking about.

When I came inside to check on mom, I noticed she was acting shifty. Not making eye contact, washing hands, she's up to something, that's when I smelled salmon. She's trying to sneak a sandwich, my own mother!!
#tbt to the fall of every hockey season, where are hopes are high, and we plan the Stanley Cup parade. Congratulations to the hire of a new coach for the Toronto Maple Leafs. #torontomapleleafs

I think I'm a great help in the garden. There should be nothing wrong with barking, it's a show of encouragement. And running around with the garden tools, that's just plain fun. You just have to lighten up!
Call me when the work is done, then we can celebrate together. It may look like I'm getting up, but I'm not. It's Saturday and I believe that naps are a given, so if you don't mind.
So the gate was open, and I wanted to see what was on the other side!  I went up the street, just a bit, and the next thing I see is dad with a bag of treats, calling me. The days starting off great!
For my dads birthday today I'm going offer him a treat, just one biscuit. I don't expect him to do the biscuit dance as well as I do, as you know I'm an experienced performer.
Happy Mothers Day my fur friends. Today I will share my treats, stare adoringly and use my inside voice.  Just to show you how much I love you ð¹ððºð·

I would think if I'm in the front yard that people would automatically come visit. They didn't, so I had to make some noise.  That's just about the time I got in trouble. I was just being friendly neighbour!
I got in a bit of trouble for barking at dad's weight scales. There are two scales, the second set of scales keeps the first one honest. Apparently the scales like to mess around with the numbers!
I'm at the train station waiting for my brother!  I get to show off my new harness when we go for a walk. He also knows where the treat cabinet is!

Getting ready for the party tonight!  I'm expected to mingle and ensure everyone has treats. When my brother comes home we go on walks together, which qualifies me for a special treat.  Gonna be a good day!
This weekend we will be celebrating moms birthday. You know what that means, roast beef and gravy. Also mom will be embracing everything, why not embrace my thickness!

With spring comes a lot distractions. Even in the rain, which I hate, I'm on a scent overload, there's no perfect spot anymore. I know those birds are watching me, judging me and the rabbits, well that's another story.

Why can't I go to Costco?  I can just sit in the food court and wait, it'll be no problem. While I'm waiting I could have some pizza. Just show your membership card and don't act nervous, act like we do this all the time!

Did you just say you're leaving?  I'd like a little more notice in the future. I need to prepare, is the treat supply sufficient, is my nap schedule going to be affected?  So much to do, so little time!

I had a horrible experience. I was in the closet barking at the corner and somehow the door closed. I heard my mom calling my name, she couldn't find me, treats were flashing before my eyes!  It was just horrible!
The good news is I found a piece of rawhide I buried last summer, the bad news is I found it by digging and it was rotten. That's my mom reporting the bad news, she just has to lighten up!

I have a lot of responsibilities, which I take quite seriously. I'm constantly monitoring the neighbours, I'm looking for any movement. Kitchen duty, the hub of activity. It's a busy day once I get started!
We are meeting up with some of moms friends for a walk today. One friend said we were walking to the Chip Truck. Not sure what that is, but by the horrified look on moms face it must be good! ð

I don't know what the big fuss is about when I visit the neighbours. I saw another opportunity this morning and I took it. Next thing I know dad is calling me with a piece of cheese, that was an unexpected bonus.

#tbt  This was when someone thought I would like to play in the water. You know, start small, then build up from there. Yes, I'll have a drink and maybe bark at it, but if you think I'm getting in, not happening!

5.  Hates bath

I have tagged others to share if you would like.
Do you know how much time it takes to smell individual pieces of grass?  I'm never given enough time on my walks, I'm just getting into a story and yank, off we go!  #tongueouttuesday
@lucyandelvis14 wanted us to share a memory.  This is one of a thousand, everyday brings joy!  Would you like to share a memory: @thebasturdhound @donnawesleyhound @norbigs @beauregardthebasset
It's a special day today, I turned 3!  You may think I would have certain demands, but no I'm just letting the day take its natural course. If there happens to be salmon I'd be grateful!

I'm formally putting in a complaint, ribs were served at dinner and I was not offered any. I find this outrageous. Yes, I did get a chicken strip and a sweet potato chew, but this can't overshadow the injustice!
For those who are new friends, I thought you would like to see the biscuit dance. This is a ritual with every biscuit every time. This is a repost.
I have to hurry, not allowed to bury indoor bones outside. Have you ever heard of such nonsense!  Mom left the door open and I seized the moment, is she looking?
Ok, the excitement overtook me when dad came home. So I was loud, ran around in circles and caused havoc, but you couldn't dampen my spirit. I just wanted dad to know he was missed!
Hey mom, would you look at this, the neighbour has company. He's making breakfast, and I bet there's bacon. Maybe we should go over and say hi. Just saying!!
I'm on top of the world!  It's Friday!  Now I have to figure a way to get down.
My New Years resolution, eat well, exercise, find and use humour, be tolerant of others (especially humans), and add just a pinch of sassy!
How long can these people hold out, I've had no extra treats since the doc said I was heavy. I'm still going to pursue because I know they are weak and I'm irresistible!
I like watching movies, it always gives me time to catch up. Mom and I have had some girl time. We went walking with our gal friends again and sorry to report, no Chip Truck visit.
The La-Z-boy chair in our house has been renamed the La-Z-girl. I'm not sure what that implies, just as long as you do not disturb.
Alright, here's what happened, I was in the garden, checking on the plants, one thing led to another and the plant accidentally fell apart. Now is that cause for such colourful language.

I have teamed up with mom to keep the rabbit out of the garden. It dug a hole and filled it with dead grass, not something I would do. I will be busy doing perimeter patrol and of course to be rewarded accordingly.
No sign of the rabbit today, I've increased patrols. I didn't realize they were called varmints, mom was on a blue streak. All of a sudden I'm looking pretty good!
When mom came back from the hairdressers, she said she got butchered. The lady was on auto-correct. If you were at the butchers, then where's the meat?
It's raining so I'm not getting up, and I won't be going outside. You may have other plans, so just go on about your own business. Now if you're planning a big breakfast I'll reconsider my options.
You know how I feel about Monday's, besides it's cold and rainy. So you can stop going on  about seizing the moment, and oh what a beautiful day. Maybe by noon I'll have a different outlook.
I'm listening to mom babble on about health and wellness, your lifestyle choices, you are what you eat, you get the picture. The trick is to not get that glazed over look.

I see you've formed a planning committee for today's activities.  Let's start with bacon and eggs, then nap till lunch, salmon sandwich, nap till dinner, jump right in if you want to add anything. I'm just covering the essentials.
Mom said I was a good girl while she washed windows, but I was napping. Usually I like to run around with the paper towels and bark at the ladder!

I want to be ready just in case mom and dad take me to see Jerry Seinfeld tonight. It'll be great, we can get refreshments, have some laughs, do a little meet and greet!  It's the makings of a great evening.
I've had my identity stripped, because that's what a bath does. And you know what you can do with that all Natural moisturizing shampoo.  What will my friends think when they get a whiff of this.
A word of advice if you just had a bath, get out there right away and start rolling. The indignity of a bath will slowly fade if you make all things right by a good roll. I'm smelling better already!
Oh pardon me, please continue, I heard almost everything you said. What you could do is just give me the highlights in point form. I'll also need some quiet time to digest what you just said.
Dad's cooking a big breakfast for his golf buddies, so I'm expecting some bacon and ham. Positioning is critical at these times. I'm keeping my eye on the prize!
#tbt Dad is away golfing, so mom and I are going to kick our heels up. No idea what that means, maybe a little singing and dancing to the oldies!
